SEARCH
Package controller

Class BTOProjectController

Object
BTOProjectController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProjectService
public class BTOProjectController extends Object implements IProjectService
Controller class for managing BTO projects This class handles the creation, deletion, and management of BTO projects

    • createProject

      public BTOProject createProject(Manager manager, String projectName, String neighbourhood, Map<FlatType,Integer> unitCounts, Map<FlatType,Double> unitPrices, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int availableOfficerSlots)
      Create a new BTO project if there isn't already a project with the same name
      Specified by:
      createProject in interface IProjectService
      Parameters:
      manager - Manager creating the project
      projectName - Name of the project
      neighbourhood - Neighbourhood of the project
      unitCounts - Map of flat types to their unit counts
      unitPrices - Map of flat types to their unit prices
      openingDate - Opening date of the project
      closingDate - Closing date of the project
      availableOfficerSlots - Number of available officer slots for the project
      Returns:
      BTOProject object if created successfully, null if project already exists

    • bookFlat

      public boolean bookFlat(BTOApplication application, BTOProject project, FlatType flatType, User user)
      Handle flat booking process based on user role - Applicant: Reserve a flat and set application status to PENDING_BOOKING - Officer: Confirm booking and set application status to BOOKED
      Specified by:
      bookFlat in interface IProjectService
      Parameters:
      application - BTOApplication for booking
      project - BTOProject being booked
      flatType - Type of flat being booked
      user - User making the booking
      Returns:
      True if booking successful, false otherwise
